sources.title: She Beast
sources.description: Title: She Beast Summary: A young woman is driving alongside a lake. She has an accident and the car plunges into the water. Her body is then possessed by the spirit of an 18th-century witch who was killed by local ... Directed by: Michael Reeves Actors: Barbara Steele, John Karlsen, Ian Ogilvy Production Company: Euro American Pictures Release Date: June 1966 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 A young woman is driving alongside a lake. She has an accident and the car plunges into the water. Her body is then possessed by the spirit of an 18th-century witch who was killed by local villagers, and is bent on avenging herself on them.

sources.title: She Beast (1966)

Her body is then possessed by the spirit of an 18th-century witch who was killed by local villagers, and is bent on avenging herself on them. metadata.Plot: A young woman is driving alongside a lake. She has an accident and the car plunges into the water. Her body is then possessed by the spirit of an 18th-century witch who was killed by local villagers, and is bent on avenging herself on them.
